Gospel-holinesse, or, The saving sight of God laid open from Isa. 6.5 together with the glorious priviledge of the saints, from Rom. 8.4, 5 : both worthily opened and applied / by ... Walter Cradock ... Cradock, Walter, 1606?-1659.
[20], 414, [20] p.
Printed by M. Simmons : and are to be sold by Joseph Blaik-lock ..., London : 1651.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. "Mount Sion, or, the priviledge and practice of the saints", 1649, has special t.p. Table of contents: p. [13]-[20] Index: p. [1]-[20] at end.
